actions.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The dragon exhales a blast of frost in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) cold damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.
actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The dragon makes one Tail attack.
actions.name: Tail Attack

actions.description: Magical ice covers the ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of itself. The ice, which is difficult terrain for all creatures except lunar dragons, lasts for 10 minutes or until the dragon uses this legendary action again.
actions.name: Treacherous Ice

specialTraits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)

specialTraits.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 15-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
specialTraits.name: Tunneler
